subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal was seeded No. 1 for the United States Open on Tuesday, making it the first time since January 2004 that a man other than Roger Federer will hold the top spot at a Grand Slam tournament. Ana Ivanovic was the No. 1 seed on the women’s side. The tournament begins Aug. 25. Lleyton Hewitt, the 2001 champion, withdrew because he underwent hip surgery.
